name: Identifying Energy Discourses in Canada with Q Methodology
description: This study includes documents and research material related to the identification of energy discourses in Canada with Q Methodology. Items include the concourse of statements, the sort board, datasets from several studies, and reports.

distribution.name: Q Method Sort Board.docx
distribution.description: Sort board utilized with research participants to facility sorting of statements

distribution.name: Statements with numbers.docx
distribution.description: Concourse of statements related to energy development in Canada

distribution.name: UNB Qsort FINAL.client.xlsx
distribution.description: Contains data from a national survey using Q methodology with a web-based interface

distribution.name: UNB Qsort FINAL data dictionary.xls
distribution.description: Details regarding the structure of the Q Sort dataset
